channel.title: Authors on Constantin Stamatiadis
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Constantin Stamatiadis

item.description: I’m a Roboticist with a Multi-Cultural background. I have in-depth tech know-how but have always been keen on discovering other fields. That is why I decided to embark on the JMP journey at Bosch. A 2-year multi-rotation graduate program to discover Bosch and grow as a future leader. My current focus lies in the world of Autonomous Systems (Robotics & Autonomous Driving). Before my time at Bosch, I got a B.
